author: jochembrouwer
content: Hi all, I am optimizing our EVM, and I assumed that warm addresses would be somewhat related to touched accounts (I actually assumed that they would be equal except that the items in the access list could be "warm", but not in touched). However this doesn't seem the case. If I `EXTCODECOPY` then it will add the target address to warm addresses, but it will not touch the account. I wonder how other clients have optimized this: it now seems I need to track 2 separate journals, one for touched and one for warm addresses (+ warm slots)
